posts.title: My Home Town
posts.content: Varanasi is a city on the Ganges river in northern India that has a central place in the traditions of pilgrimage, death, and mourning in the Hindu world.

posts.title: This is best redux post.
posts.content: Redux is an open-source JavaScript library used to manage application state. React uses Redux for building the user interface.
